Title: Prohibits the imposition of a charge or deduction from a payment due to a health care provider because such payment is made through electronic or paper means
Summary: Prohibits the imposition of a charge or deduction from a payment due to a health care provider because such payment is made through electronic or paper means.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting the imposition of a charge or deduction from a payment due to a health care provider because such payment is made through electronic or paper means
